actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to make the monthly retirement test available in limited circumstances in the case of certain beneficiaries, to amend the technical requirements for entitlement to medicare, and for other purposes.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Social Security Technical Amendments of 1978 - Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to prevent, in calculating the deduction from an individual's benefits because of work, excess earnings from being charged to any month in which an individual did not engage in self-employment and did not render services for wages of more than the applicable exempt amount as determined under title II. Extends Medicare hospital insurance benefits, available to individuals entitled to benefits under title II, to other individuals who would be entitled to benefits under title II except that such individuals have not applied for such benefits.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to make the monthly retirement test available in limited circumstances in the case of certain beneficiaries, to amend the technical requirements for entitlement to medicare, and for other purposes.
